column1: Later that year Stevenson invested in a combined solar and battery system. And as another major storm Hurricane Florence now spins toward the Eastern Seaboard threatening to inundate homes and cut power for millions of residents from South Carolina to Maryland she will be among the thousands of Americans potentially relying not on rumbling gas-guzzling generators but quiet racks of batteries mounted in their garages And as another major storm Hurricane Florence now spins toward the Eastern Seaboard threatening to inundate homes and cut power for millions of residents from South Carolina to Maryland she will
